Row.Text: +50% [ICON_CULTURE] in this City. Contains 3 slots for Artifacts.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Must have built a Museum in the City. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.
This National Wonder increases the culture output of the city in which it is constructed in by 50%. It cannot be constructed unless the civilization has a Museum in the City.
To maximize the theming bonus, make sure to have artifacts that belong to unique eras from your civilization.

A national museum is a museum maintained by a nation and its government. It usually displays its own country's artifacts. National museums are regarded as a source of instilling national pride and esteem. They are often located in the country's seat of government.
